translations: adj．导致窒息的：引起窒息或窒息死亡的。
· The asphyxiating gas caused the miners to lose consciousness.
导致窒息的气体使矿工们失去了知觉。
v．使窒息：使某人因缺氧而窒息或死亡。
· The smoke from the fire was asphyxiating the trapped people.
火灾产生的烟雾使被困的人们窒息。

sentences.sentence: Your eyes will become blind when the asphyxiating aroma surrounds you.
sentences.translation: 当窒息的芳香包围你的时候，你的双眼会失明。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To promote the understanding of the image features of asphyxiating thoracic dysplasia (ATD).
sentences.translation: 目的：加深对窒息性胸廓发育不良(atd)影像表现的认识。

sentences.sentence: The resulting carbon dioxide cloud rushed downhill, asphyxiating 1,700 people and thousands more animals.
sentences.translation: 所产生的二氧化碳的云层冲向下坡，使1,700多人和数千只的动物窒息而死。
